verses.name: Mark 14:47
verses.text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword, and smote a servant of the high priest, and cut off his ear.

verses.name: Mark 14:48
verses.text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?

verses.name: Mark 14:49
verses.text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching, and ye took me not: but the scriptures must be fulfilled.

verses.name: Mark 14:50
verses.text: And they all forsook him, and fled.

verses.name: Mark 14:51
verses.text: And there followed him a certain young man, having a linen cloth cast about his naked body; and the young men laid hold on him:
